attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I was one of the 1.8 million people who signed the petition to stop road pricing .
It seems like the people who live in the uk have no say in what goes on .
we dont want to have road pricing we pay enough allready to use the roads , and it does not reduce congestion all it does is raise more money for the goverment to use esle where.
You also say that we can use the buses tubes etc , this also have a high price to use these services , IT COSTS  £4 now to use the bus to go to your local town.
STOP making us a poorer uk .
Please stop your decison on road pricing and if you really have to go ahead please ask the people your party works for US the people of the united kingdom our views

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
